00038 class KVILIB_API KviSharedFile : public KviHeapObject
00039 {
00040 public:
00041         KviSharedFile(const QString & szName, const QString & szAbsPath, const QString & szUserMask, time_t expireTime, unsigned int uFileSize);
00042         ~KviSharedFile();
00043 private:
00044         QString      m_szName;
00045         QString      m_szAbsFilePath;
00046         time_t       m_expireTime;
00047         QString      m_szUserMask;
00048         unsigned int m_uFileSize;
00049         unsigned int m_uWildCount;
00050         unsigned int m_uNonWildCount;
00051 public:
00052         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00053 
00054         const QString & absFilePath(){ return m_szAbsFilePath; };
00055 
00056         const QString & userMask(){ return m_szUserMask; };
00057 
00058         time_t expireTime(){ return m_expireTime; };
00059         bool expires(){ return (m_expireTime != 0); };
00060 
00061         unsigned int fileSize(){ return m_uFileSize; };
00062 
00063         unsigned int wildcardCount(){ return m_uWildCount; };
00064         unsigned int nonWildcardCount(){ return m_uNonWildCount; };
00065         int maskLength(){ return m_szUserMask.length(); };
00066 };
